A brief about Kent Scholarship:

The Kent Scholarship for Academic Excellence in the UK is offered for a Bachelor’s degree in the field of subject offered at the University the application deadline is different.       The scholarship is delivered by the University of Kent and the charge of this scholarship is Part Backing, £2,000. This scholarship is open to all nationals

  • Degree: Bachelors
  • Provided by: University of Kent
  • Deadline: The deadline varies
  • Scholarship value: Partial Funding, £2,000

The University of Kent has introduced The  Scholarship for Academic Excellence in the UK to support financially all the students registering in any progress of study at the university.

Kent University Scholarship

Kent University offers a range of scholarships to both undergraduate and postgraduate students, including international students. Some of the scholarships available are:

Kent Scholarship for Academic Excellence: This scholarship is awarded to students who achieve exceptional academic results in their high school or undergraduate studies. The scholarship is worth up to £10,000 for the first year of study.

International Scholarships for Taught Masters Students: This scholarship is open to international students who have received an offer to study a taught Masters degree at Kent. The scholarship is worth £8,000 and is awarded based on academic merit.

Postgraduate Research Scholarship: This scholarship is awarded to students who are pursuing a postgraduate research degree at Kent. The scholarship is worth up to £16,000 and is awarded based on academic merit.

Kent Law School Taught Masters Scholarships: This scholarship is open to students who have received an offer to study a taught Masters degree in law at Kent. The scholarship is worth up to £5,000 and is awarded based on academic merit.

Eligibility for University Kent Scholarship:

Candidates from all nationalities are eligible.

All Candidates need to be entering the first year (Stage 1) of undergraduate degree study at the University of Kent’s Canterbury or Medway campus.

Applicants must have accomplished the required scores for at least one of the qualifications

shown below.

  • Applicants must have attained any qualification higher than those listed below (i.e. do not already hold an undergraduate degree).
  • Candidates must not be participating in the Higher Degree Training arrangement.
  • All Contenders must fulfill the conditions of entry admission to the University of Kent.
  • Candidates must have A*AA at A level (or specified equivalents) and meet other principles.

University of Kent Scholarship Value

The Kent Scholarship for Academic Excellence in the UK:

The effective candidates of the University of Kent Excellence in the UK will receive a scholarship value of £2,000 for stage 1 (first year) of study.

Please note: The scholarship may be held in union with the University endowment and most other

undergraduate grants.

FAQ

Does University of Kent offer scholarship?

Kent offers a comprehensive variety of scholarships to students who achieve outstanding academic merits from entry level and beyond in their undergraduate and postgraduate studies.

International Scholarships 2024

The University is pleased to be able to provide a number of scholarships for our international students and has a long history of welcoming international students from all over the world.

How can I get a scholarship to Kent University?

Undergraduate (Full-time) Candidates must be registered for a humanities college class at the College of Kent beginning in September 2024 by the UCAS cutoff time of 30 June 2024, 18:00 BST. All Applications for the Scholarship should be made by 29 October, 23:59 GMT.
